description: This file defines an interface `ILanguageTag` within the WPEFramework namespace, specifically in the Exchange subnamespace. It models a language tagging system with notification capabilities to inform when the language has changed. It includes methods for registration, unregistration, and retrieval or setting of the current language. It also defines a nested notification interface to signal language changes.

classes.name: ILanguageTag
classes.description: An interface representing a language tag system with notification support for language changes.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification sink to receive language change events.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered notification sink.

methods.name: Language
methods.description: Retrieves the current language setting as per RFC5646.

methods.name: Language (setter)
methods.description: Sets the language using a given language string.

nested_classes.name: INotification
nested_classes.description: Interface for receiving notifications when the language changes.

methods.name: LanguageChanged
methods.description: Callback invoked when the language tag is changed.

ctags.name: ILanguageTag
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL ILanguageTag : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
